Experiment Method.Assay Method: Macroautophagy activation and mitochondrial destruction analysis

Material used.Material Name: Primary cortical neurons overexpressing mutant A53T α-synuclein
Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using primary cortical neurons that overexpress mutant A53T α-synuclein.

Readout description.Result Description: The activation of macroautophagy led to mitochondrial destruction and dysfunction in neurons overexpressing mutant A53T α-synuclein.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type α-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Silencing Parkin or overexpressing wild-type Mitofusin 2 were used as negative controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal mitochondrial content and function, as determined by fluorescence microscopy or flow cytometry.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant reduction in mitochondrial content or dysfunction observed via fluorescence microscopy or flow cytometry.
